title: To reduce some of the problems downtown (fights, traffic, crime), is it possible to extend the closing time for bars downtown past two - to say, 3 or 4, so that not all the bar patrons are suddenly forced into the street at the same time.  With a later closing time, possibly, the number of people in the bars at closing time would be significantly reduced.
